title: Student ID
description: To get a student ID, go to the Principal Administration Office with your registration receipt.

title: Course Registration
description: For course registration, visit the Preparatory Department administration office and complete the registration form provided.

title: Transcript Request
description: To request a transcript, go to the Principal Administration and fill out the official transcript request form. It usually takes 3 working days.

title: Exam Schedule Inquiry
description: Exam schedules for math courses can be obtained from the Math Department notice board or the department secretary.

title: Wi-Fi Access Assistance
description: For help with Wi-Fi or login issues, visit the Info Department's IT support desk on the first floor.

title: Classroom Change Request
description: To request a classroom change in the Preparatory Department, speak with the academic coordinator in their office.

title: Lost and Found
description: Lost items around the campus should be reported to or retrieved from the Principal Administration. or you can use your campus online platfrom to report the item

title: Project Submission
description: Final year project submissions for Info students must be handed in to the Info Department's secretary before the stated deadline.

title: Scholarship Application
description: Scholarship forms and related inquiries should be directed to the Principal Administration's financial aid section.

title: Lab Access Pass
description: To access specialized computer labs in the Info Department, students must request a lab pass from the lab supervisor.
